steps.title: Demo for Matt
steps.description: This dashboard demonstrates a couple of features we want to highlight, starting with applying selection...

steps.title: With some selection
steps.description:
As you can see, we can select values in a chart as though a user clicked the bar!
Next is filtering...

steps.title: With a new dimension
steps.description: And we're done, this is the last step, nothing else to see here.
